View summary tables of the water quality monitoring results

Source: R/readMWRresultsview.R
readMWRresultsview.Rd

View summary tables of columns in the water quality monitoring results to troubleshoot checks with readMWRresults

Usage

readMWRresultsview(respth, columns)

Arguments

respth

character string of path to the results file

columns

character string indicating which columns to view, can be one or two column names, see details

Value

A summary table of counts of observations in the water quality monitoring results for the selected column(s)

Details

Acceptable options for the columns argument include one or two of the column names in the results file. An error is returned indicating acceptable values if the column names are not found.

One or two column names can be provided to the columns argument. If one column is provided, a simple table showing the unique number of observations that correspond to all entries in the provided column is returned. If two column names are provided, a two-dimensional table showing the counts that apply to the unique combinations of the two columns is returned. For example, using columns = c('Characteristic Name', 'Result Units') will return a table where the rows are the unique parameters ("Characteristic Name") and the columns are the unique units ("Result Unit") found in the results file. The numbers in the table show the unique observations that correspond to each parameter and result unit combination.

These tables can be useful to troubleshoot the checks when importing the water quality monitoring result file with readMWRresults, e.g., by seeing which units apply to a parameter and if they correspond to the acceptable values for the package (see https://massbays-tech.github.io/MassWateR/articles/MassWateR.html#data-import-and-checks).

Examples

respth <- system.file('extdata/ExampleResults.xlsx', package = 'MassWateR')

# parameters only
readMWRresultsview(respth, columns = 'Characteristic Name')
#> Characteristic Name
#>       Air Temp        Ammonia          Chl a             DO  DO saturation 
#>            211            154             18            201            203 
#>         E.coli           Flow           Gage        Nitrate        Ortho P 
#>            189             53             59            113            183 
#> Sp Conductance             TP            TSS     Water Temp             pH 
#>            215            255            202            382            214 

# parameters and units
readMWRresultsview(respth, columns = c('Characteristic Name', 'Result Unit'))
#>                    Result Unit
#> Characteristic Name   % cfs cfu/100ml deg C  ft mg/l s.u. uS/cm ug/l
#>      Air Temp         0   0         0   211   0    0    0     0    0
#>      Ammonia          0   0         0     0   0  154    0     0    0
#>      Chl a            0   0         0     0   0    0    0     0   18
#>      DO               0   0         0     0   0  201    0     0    0
#>      DO saturation  203   0         0     0   0    0    0     0    0
#>      E.coli           0   0       189     0   0    0    0     0    0
#>      Flow             0  53         0     0   0    0    0     0    0
#>      Gage             0   0         0     0  59    0    0     0    0
#>      Nitrate          0   0         0     0   0  113    0     0    0
#>      Ortho P          0   0         0     0   0  183    0     0    0
#>      Sp Conductance   0   0         0     0   0    0    0   215    0
#>      TP               0   0         0     0   0  255    0     0    0
#>      TSS              0   0         0     0   0  202    0     0    0
#>      Water Temp       0   0         0   382   0    0    0     0    0
#>      pH               0   0         0     0   0    0  214     0    0

# activity types and parameters
readMWRresultsview(respth, columns = c('Activity Type', 'Characteristic Name'))
#>                                          Characteristic Name
#> Activity Type                             Air Temp Ammonia Chl a  DO
#>   Field Msr/Obs                                211       0     0 199
#>   Quality Control Field Calibration Check        0       0     0   2
#>   Quality Control Sample-Field Blank             0       7     0   0
#>   Quality Control Sample-Lab Blank               0       9     0   0
#>   Quality Control Sample-Lab Duplicate           0       0     0   0
#>   Quality Control Sample-Lab Spike               0       0     0   0
#>   Sample-Routine                                 0     138    18   0
#>                                          Characteristic Name
#> Activity Type                             DO saturation E.coli Flow Gage
#>   Field Msr/Obs                                     199      0   53   59
#>   Quality Control Field Calibration Check             4      0    0    0
#>   Quality Control Sample-Field Blank                  0      3    0    0
#>   Quality Control Sample-Lab Blank                    0      0    0    0
#>   Quality Control Sample-Lab Duplicate                0      6    0    0
#>   Quality Control Sample-Lab Spike                    0      0    0    0
#>   Sample-Routine                                      0    180    0    0
#>                                          Characteristic Name
#> Activity Type                             Nitrate Ortho P Sp Conductance  TP
#>   Field Msr/Obs                                 0       0            199   0
#>   Quality Control Field Calibration Check       0       0             11   0
#>   Quality Control Sample-Field Blank            0       0              0   9
#>   Quality Control Sample-Lab Blank              0       0              5   8
#>   Quality Control Sample-Lab Duplicate         11       0              0  12
#>   Quality Control Sample-Lab Spike              6       8              0  21
#>   Sample-Routine                               96     175              0 205
#>                                          Characteristic Name
#> Activity Type                             TSS Water Temp  pH
#>   Field Msr/Obs                             0        382 199
#>   Quality Control Field Calibration Check   0          0   9
#>   Quality Control Sample-Field Blank        0          0   0
#>   Quality Control Sample-Lab Blank          0          0   0
#>   Quality Control Sample-Lab Duplicate      0          0   6
#>   Quality Control Sample-Lab Spike          0          0   0
#>   Sample-Routine                          202          0   0
